card.name: SBI Bank Credit Card EMI
card.description: Credit Card EMI transactions on SBI Bank Credit Cards for purchasing Samsung Consumer Electronics products with additional instant discount offers.
card.target_audience: SBI Bank Credit Card holders purchasing Samsung Consumer Electronics products via EMI

rewards.program: Additional Instant Discount on SBI Bank Credit Card EMI Transactions

categories.name: Instant Discount on EMI
categories.description: Instant discount applied on total EMI amount at payment gateway for eligible SBI Credit Card EMI transactions.
categories.terms_and_conditions: Discount reflected only if shown on payment gateway; limited to one transaction per card during offer period; discount not applicable on corporate cards; delinquent and over-limit cards not eligible.
categories.how_to_earn: Make EMI transaction on SBI Credit Card for Samsung CE products on Samsung website during offer period.
categories.exclusions: Corporate cards, delinquent and over-limit cards, multiple transactions per card in a month.

bonus_rates.terms_and_conditions: Discount varies from 5% to 20% based on product and tenure; maximum discount limits apply per product category.

redemption.option: Instant discount credited on SBI Credit Card EMI payment
redemption.process: Discount is automatically applied and reflected on payment gateway during EMI transaction.
redemption.terms_and_conditions: Discount cannot be settled in cash; only one transaction per card allowed during offer period; discount not clubbable with other offers unless specified.

benefits.name: Additional Instant Discount on SBI Credit Card EMI
benefits.description: Additional discount ranging from 5% to 20% on Samsung Consumer Electronics products purchased via SBI Credit Card EMI.
benefits.how_to_avail: Purchase Samsung CE products on Samsung website using SBI Credit Card EMI during offer period.
benefits.terms_and_conditions: Discount reflected on payment gateway only; maximum discount limits apply per product category; one transaction per card per month; excludes corporate cards and delinquent cards.
benefits.eligibility: SBI Credit Card holders with valid EMI transactions
benefits.usage_limit: One transaction per card during offer period

current_offers.title: Additional Instant Discount on SBI Bank EMI Transactions
current_offers.description: Get additional instant discount when purchasing Samsung Consumer Electronics products using SBI Bank Credit Card EMI.
current_offers.terms_and_conditions: Discount applicable only on SBI Credit Card EMI transactions of 3/6/9/12 month tenures; maximum discount capped per product category; excludes corporate cards; discount not clubbable with other offers unless specified; delinquent and over-limit cards not eligible.
current_offers.eligibility: SBI Credit Card holders making EMI transactions on Samsung website
current_offers.maximum_benefit: Up to ₹20,000 for Panels, ₹12,000 for Dish Washer, Refrigerator, Washing Machines at 20% discount tier, and other caps for other discount tiers.
current_offers.exclusions: Corporate cards, delinquent and over-limit cards, multiple transactions per card in a month

partnerships.benefit: Additional instant discount on purchase of Samsung Consumer Electronics products
partnerships.how_to_avail: Use SBI Bank Credit Card EMI on Samsung website during offer period
partnerships.terms_and_conditions: Discount reflected on payment gateway only; one transaction per card per month; excludes corporate cards; discount not clubbable with other offers unless specified.
partnerships.maximum_discount: ₹20,000 for Panels, ₹12,000 for Dish Washer, Refrigerator, Washing Machines at 20% tier, and other caps for other tiers
